titleStmt.title: The tryumphs of honor and industry A solemnity performed through the City, at confirmation and establishment of the Right Honorable, George Bovvles, in the office of his Maiesties lieuetenant, the Lord Mayor of the famous Citty of London. Taking beginning at his Lordships going, and proceeding after his returne from receiuing the oath of maioralty at Westminster, on the morrow next after Simon and Iudes day, October 29. 1617.
titleStmt.author: Middleton, Thomas, d. 1627.

titleStmt.title: The tryumphs of honor and industry A solemnity performed through the City, at confirmation and establishment of the Right Honorable, George Bovvles, in the office of his Maiesties lieuetenant, the Lord Mayor of the famous Citty of London. Taking beginning at his Lordships going, and proceeding after his returne from receiuing the oath of maioralty at Westminster, on the morrow next after Simon and Iudes day, October 29. 1617.
titleStmt.author: Middleton, Thomas, d. 1627.

notesStmt.note: Dedication signed: T.M., i.e. Thomas Middleton.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

person.persName: Bowles, George, Lord Mayor of London.
